\caption{List of the simple Minkowskian Jordan algebras

the number of vector fields $(\ensuremath{\tilde{n}}+1)=(D-1)$
and the number of scalars $\ensuremath{\tilde{n}}=(D-2)$ in the corresponding MESGTs}
